description.value:
Eldar Rune often used by Farseers. Once per Round, the user may choose to reduce or increase the roll they made on a Psychic Phenomena or Perils of the Warp Table by a number up to their Perception Bonus.

Requirements

Xenotech. Not something a character would normally be able to acquire.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
